text: - My name is Jack French.

I'm director of Cloud Platforms
at World Wide Technology.
The Cloud Platforms team, my group,

handles all of our cloud
go-to-market solution development
as well as our cloud marketplace business.

World Wide Technology, it's a
30 plus year old organization
headquartered out of St. Louis.

We truly are worldwide so it's
a support global customers.

One of the other major benefits
for the AWS Marketplace
that we found not only for our customers

but also for our own sellers
and our own services teams
are the speed to procurement,

being able to run a deal
through the marketplace

within a day versus sometimes
weeks or even months

if maybe we don't have
paper with a partner

or there's no budget allocated
but there's an initiative

or an outcome that we need
to drive for an organization,

we can run that software
deal or that ISV deal
through the marketplace much faster now
than we could previously.

In addition to just providing
value around services

or technical expertise
around these solutions

that we're running
through the marketplace,

we'll also spend time doing
marketplace assessments

with our procurement contacts
or with the different teams

and our customer to make
sure that they're ready
for what could be a lot more business
running through the AWS Marketplace.

So we like to provide value
with our technology providers
and ISVs and OEMs with services
and certifications and technical depth
but it's more than that.
It's also helping the the customer
understand the new procurement models

making sure that they're ready
to transact in the future

so they can be as quick as
we can be with the partners.
I want to do what's right for the customer
and so the marketplace is a place

where we need to be able
to meet the customer
and if that's where they want to transact,
that's where we need to be experts at

and we need to make sure
that we're able to make that
as smooth as possible
while providing as much value as possible.
And so I wouldn't say that I prioritize it
any more than anything else that we do.

It's just an amazing tool
to have in our tool belt
to move deals through quicker

and to meet our customers
where they need to be.
